sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"停留，逗留"之意。
means: remain ： 指某人或某物仍留在原处或保持原来的状态。
linger ： 着重因愉快的事而使人不愿离开。
stay ： 普通用词，多指人在某地暂时逗留。有时可指较长时间的居留。

stems_affixes.word_buile: stab=stable稳定的,安定的+ility→n.稳定,安定
sta站,立+age场所,状态等→n.舞台，戏剧；阶段，时期

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逗留, 延缓, 中止, 支柱
stems_affixes.word_buile: sta站,立+y→n.逗留, 延缓, 中止, 支柱 v.在, 暂住
e=ex+stable牢固的+ish表动词→establish使其完全牢固→建立,设立,安置
sta站,立+y→n.逗留, 延缓, 中止, 支柱 v.在, 暂住

phrase.cizu_name: be here (或 have come) to stay

lj.lj_ly: the private sector is here to stay and likely to expand.
lj.lj_ls: 那个私营部门已经得到普遍认可并有可能扩大规模。

jx.jx_en_mean: keep going strongly to the end of a race or contest
a delay in carrying out a court order
(S. African)used on departing as an expression of good wishes from the person leaving to the one staying
jx.jx_cn_mean: (南非)［分别时离开者对留下者的表达语］留得安好

jx.jx_en_mean: (of a sailing ship) be head to the wind while tacking
(of a sailing ship) fail in an attempt to go about from one tack to another
continue to study, work, or be somewhere after others have left
jx.jx_cn_mean: 继续学习（或工作）；继续留下

lj.lj_ly: 75 per cent of sixteen-year-olds stay on in full-time education.
lj.lj_ls: 75％的16岁孩子继续接受全日制教育。

jx.jx_en_mean: (of a guest or visitor) sleep somewhere, especially at someone's home, for the night
jx.jx_cn_mean: （客人或造访者呆在别人家里）过夜

jx.jx_en_mean: To remain in a fixed or established position.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 坚守：保持在固定或确定的位置上

jx.jx_en_mean: To hold out or persevere to the end of a race or challenge.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 坚持到比赛或挑战的最后

entry.def: If you stay where you are, you continue to be there and do not leave.

example.ex: 'Stay here,' Trish said. 'I'll bring the car down the drive to take you back.'...
example.tran: “呆这别动，”特里西说,“我会把车开过来送你回去。”

example.ex: In the old days the woman stayed at home and the man earned the money.

entry.def: If you stay in a town, or hotel, or at someone's house, you live there for a short time.
entry.tran: (在某城市、旅馆或别人家)暂住，逗留

example.ex: Gordon stayed at The Park Hotel, Milan...
example.tran: 戈登下榻在米兰的帕克饭店。

example.ex: He tried to stay a few months every year in Scotland.
example.tran: 他每年都会争取在苏格兰住几个月。

entry.def: If someone or something stays in a particular state or situation, they continue to be in it.

example.ex: The Republican candidate said he would 'work like crazy to stay ahead'.
example.tran: 共和党候选人说他将“拼命保持领先优势”。

example.ex: ...community care networks that offer classes on how to stay healthy...
example.tran: 开设养生课程的社区保健网络

entry.def: If you stay away from a place, you do not go there.

example.ex: Government employees and officers also stayed away from work during the strike...
example.tran: 政府雇员和官员在罢工期间也没去上班。

example.ex: Every single employee turned up at the meeting, even people who usually stayed away.
example.tran: 所有雇员一个个不落都参加了会议，甚至平常不去开会的人都去了。

entry.def: If you stay out of something, you do not get involved in it.

example.ex: In the past, the UN has stayed out of the internal affairs of countries unless invited in...
example.tran: 在过去，除非有国家提出请求,否则联合国不会干涉各国内政。

example.ex: After months of staying well out of the problem, Washington has expressed a willingness to help find a solution.
example.tran: 几个月以来都不曾介入该问题的华盛顿方面已表示愿意帮助寻求解决方案。

entry.def: If you say that something is here to stay, you mean that people have accepted it and it has become a part of everyday life.

example.ex: Satellite TV is here to stay...
example.tran: 卫星电视已被普遍接受。

example.ex: Nuclear weapons are here to stay because they have changed the way countries approach the idea of war.
example.tran: 核武器已被广泛接受，因为它们改变了各国处理战争的方法。

entry.def: If you stay put, you remain somewhere.

example.ex: He was forced by his condition to stay put and remain out of politics...
example.tran: 他的健康状况迫使他留在原处,置身于政坛之外。

example.ex: Nigel says for the moment he is very happy to stay put in Lyon.
example.tran: 奈杰尔说目前他很乐意留在里昂。

entry.def: If you stay the night in a place, you sleep there for one night.

example.ex: They had invited me to come to supper and stay the night.
example.tran: 他们邀请我去吃晚饭并住上一晚。

means.word_mean: 1. continuing or remaining in a place or state;

sentences.sentence: "they had a nice stay in Paris"
"a lengthy hospital stay"
"a four-month stay in bankruptcy court"

means.word_mean: 2. a judicial order forbidding some action until an event occurs or the order is lifted;

sentences.sentence: "the Supreme Court has the power to stay an injunction pending an appeal to the whole Court"

means.word_mean: 3. the state of inactivity following an interruption;

sentences.sentence: "the negotiations were in arrest"
"held them in check"
"during the halt he got some lunch"
"the momentary stay enabled him to escape the blow"
"he spent the entire stop in his seat"

means.word_mean: 4. (nautical) brace consisting of a heavy rope or wire cable used as a support for a mast or spar
5. a thin strip of metal or bone that is used to stiffen a garment (e.g. a corset)
1. stay the same; remain in a certain state;

sentences.sentence: "The dress remained wet after repeated attempts to dry it"
"rest assured"
"stay alone"
"He remained unmoved by her tears"
"The bad weather continued for another week"
"We are staying in Detroit; we are not moving to Cincinnati"
"Stay put in the corner here!"
"Stick around and you will learn something!"
"You can stay with me while you are in town"
"stay a bit longer--the day is still young"

means.word_mean: 4. continue in a place, position, or situation;

sentences.sentence: "After graduation, she stayed on in Cambridge as a student adviser"
"Stay with me, please"
"despite student protests, he remained Dean for another year"
"She continued as deputy mayor for another year"
"I had to stay at home and watch the children"
"Please stay the bloodshed!"
"The smell stayed in the room"
"The hostility remained long after they made up"
"ride out the storm"
"The judge stayed the execution order"
"quell my hunger"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a verb): from Anglo-Norman French estai-, stem of Old French ester, from Latin stare 'to stand'; in the sense 'support' (senses 5 of the verb and 3 of the noun), partly from Old French estaye (noun), estayer (verb), of Germanic origin
Old English stag, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch stag, from a base meaning 'be firm'

sentences.cn: 待在床上
sentences.en: to stay in bed

sentences.cn: “你要不要喝一杯？”“不，谢谢，我不能久待。”
sentences.en: ‘Do you want a drink? ’ ‘No, thanks, I can't stay. ’

sentences.cn: 待在那儿别动！
sentences.en: Stay there and don't move!

sentences.cn: 我们最终还是留了下来吃午饭。
sentences.en: We ended up staying for lunch.

sentences.cn: 孩子们小的时候，她没出去上班。
sentences.en: She stayed at home (= did not go out to work) while the children were young.

sentences.cn: 今晚我要在办公室待到很晚。
sentences.en: I'm staying late at the office tonight.

sentences.cn: 我的帽子怎么都戴不住！
sentences.en: My hat won't stay on!

sentences.cn: 你能不能等别人走后留下来帮我收拾收拾？
sentences.en: Can you stay behind after the others have gone and help me clear up?

sentences.cn: 我们留下来看有什么情况。
sentences.en: We stayed to see what would happen.

sentences.cn: 他们待在那儿一直谈到深夜。
sentences.en: They stayed talking until well into the night.

sentences.cn: 他生气时间从来不会长。
sentences.en: He never stays angry for long.

sentences.cn: 我瞌睡得再也熬不住了。
sentences.en: I can't stay awake any longer.

sentences.cn: 这商店每星期四都会开到很晚。
sentences.en: The store stays open until late on Thursdays.

sentences.cn: 我不知道他们为什么还在一起。
sentences.en: I don't know why they stay together (= remain married or in a relationship) .

sentences.cn: 上月的通货膨胀率保持在4%以下。
sentences.en: Inflation stayed below 4% last month.

sentences.cn: “呆这别动，”特里西说,“我会把车开过来送你回去。”
sentences.en: 'Stay here,' Trish said. 'I'll bring the car down the drive to take you back.'...

sentences.cn: 过去，女主内，男主外。
sentences.en: In the old days the woman stayed at home and the man earned the money.

sentences.cn: 戈登下榻在米兰的帕克饭店。
sentences.en: Gordon stayed at The Park Hotel, Milan...

sentences.cn: 他每年都会争取在苏格兰住几个月。
sentences.en: He tried to stay a few months every year in Scotland.

sentences.cn: 共和党候选人说他将“拼命保持领先优势”。
sentences.en: The Republican candidate said he would 'work like crazy to stay ahead'.

sentences.cn: 开设养生课程的社区保健网络
sentences.en: ...community care networks that offer classes on how to stay healthy...

sentences.cn: 政府雇员和官员在罢工期间也没去上班。
sentences.en: Government employees and officers also stayed away from work during the strike...

sentences.cn: 所有雇员一个个不落都参加了会议，甚至平常不去开会的人都去了。
sentences.en: Every single employee turned up at the meeting, even people who usually stayed away.

sentences.cn: 在过去，除非有国家提出请求,否则联合国不会干涉各国内政。
sentences.en: In the past, the UN has stayed out of the internal affairs of countries unless invited in...

sentences.cn: 几个月以来都不曾介入该问题的华盛顿方面已表示愿意帮助寻求解决方案。
sentences.en: After months of staying well out of the problem, Washington has expressed a willingness to help find a solution.

sentences.cn: 卫星电视已被普遍接受。
sentences.en: Satellite TV is here to stay...

sentences.cn: 核武器已被广泛接受，因为它们改变了各国处理战争的方法。
sentences.en: Nuclear weapons are here to stay because they have changed the way countries approach the idea of war.

sentences.cn: 他的健康状况迫使他留在原处,置身于政坛之外。
sentences.en: He was forced by his condition to stay put and remain out of politics...

sentences.cn: 奈杰尔说目前他很乐意留在里昂。
sentences.en: Nigel says for the moment he is very happy to stay put in Lyon.

sentences.cn: 他们邀请我去吃晚饭并住上一晚。
sentences.en: They had invited me to come to supper and stay the night.

sentences.cn: 很多人来到美国是为了在这里安家落户,而同他们一起来的也有那些无意长久停留的暂住者，他们打算赚一些钱然后就回家。
sentences.en: Along with the many folks looking to make a permanent home in the United States came those who had no intention to stay, and who would make some money and then go home.

sentences.cn: 我能延长我的停留作为一个学生 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can I extend my stay as a student?

sentences.cn: 《戏》曾经的誓言停留在昨天, 来生的宿命还未演.
sentences.en: Have vowed to stay the yesterday, yet his fate the next life.

sentences.cn: 我的观光签证可让我停留数周.
sentences.en: My tourist visa lets me stay for a couple of weeks.

sentences.cn: 不要偷听,比如:绝不在电话接通后继续停留在线上.
sentences.en: No eavesdropping . i . e . Never stay on the line after connecting a call.

sentences.cn: 不要在山丘在停留太久.
sentences.en: Don't stay on the humps too long.

sentences.cn: 不能停留但希望你花开马来大地!
sentences.en: Standing on the jetty as the steamer moves away, Flower of Malaya, I cannot stay.

sentences.cn: 他们会问一些你计划在境内停留多长时间之类的问题.
sentences.en: They ask how many days are you planning to stay, so on.

sentences.cn: 美国人在空间站停留最长的一次是珊农?西的那一次, 她1996年在和平号上停留了188天.
sentences.en: The longest American stay was that of Shannon Lucid, who spent 188 days aboard Mir in 1996.

sentences.cn: 你要在这儿停留多久?
sentences.en: How long is your stay here?

sentences.cn: 宽敞的浴室、宽大舒适的床和纯棉被单,让您的停留放松舒心.
sentences.en: A spacious bathroom and an indulgent bed with cotton linens make for a relaxing stay.

sentences.cn: 停留下会儿; 一直都在唱歌参见.
sentences.en: Stay for a while ; sang all the while . See usage Note at awhile.

sentences.cn: 您需要提供您在美国停留期间足够的资金支持证明.
sentences.en: You need to provide proof of sufficient financial support for your stay in the United States.

sentences.cn: 网站的导航系统越清晰, 人们停留的时间就会越长.
sentences.en: The easier your website is to navigate, the longer people will stay.

sentences.cn: 绝不许任何人在这里停留.
sentences.en: Anybody should in no case be allowed to stay here.

sentences.cn: 在城中停留期间,你可以与我住在一起.
sentences.en: You can stay with me while you are in town.

sentences.cn: 牙套在牙齿上停留约两年, 效果却可以持续一辈子.
sentences.en: Braces stay on teeth for about two years, but the results last a lifetime.

sentences.cn: 天涯海角无处停留, 我只是穿越树丛的一屡微风, 我仍在孤寂的街口等着你.
sentences.en: I never stayed anywhere, I'm the wind in the trees, I would wait for you forever.

sentences.cn: 至此方丹在法国国家队生涯的进球记录停留在21场比赛30球.
sentences.en: Fontaine, France's national team career scoring record of 21 games to stay in the ball 30.

sentences.cn: 祝您在美国停留期间一切愉快.
sentences.en: Have a nice stay in the United States, sir.

sentences.cn: 董先生在北京作了短暂的停留后刚刚回到了香港.
sentences.en: Mr. Dong has returned to Hong Kong after his short stay in Beijing.

sentences.cn: 我预定停留两个星期.
sentences.en: I am going to stay for two weeks.

sentences.cn: 但它不会停留在那里, 是 吗 ?
sentences.en: But it does not stay there, does it?

sentences.cn: 她在这里只停留了很短的时间.
sentences.en: She stayed here only a little while.

sentences.cn: 他整夜停留在户外.
sentences.en: He stayed outdoors all night.

sentences.cn: 市场在触底后并在底部停留相当长一段时间.
sentences.en: Market in the bottom and at the bottom to stay after a long time.

sentences.cn: 结束所有的窗户和停留远离所以最好停留在室内.
sentences.en: Close all the windows and stay away from them. You'd better stay indoors.

sentences.cn: 短期停留一般来说是不足一年的签证.
sentences.en: Generally , short stay means less than one year visa.

sentences.cn: 我停留在这空间的原因, 是因为等待著更美好的事发生.
sentences.en: I stay right here, because am waiting for more beautiful things to happen.

sentences.cn: 我们停留了一小时左右.
sentences.en: We stayed for an hour or so.

sentences.cn: 音乐盒正在启动转动, 为什么要求停止?
sentences.en: Is the music box recalling that only rotating, why asking to stay?

sentences.cn: 生活不会停止不走,撇下我们不顾.
sentences.en: Life will not stay still and let us alone.

sentences.cn: 每次停止运作后母星跳跃连接桥将出现在母星建筑列表里.
sentences.en: Starbase Jump Bridges will now stay in the Starbase Structures listing after each downtime.

sentences.cn: 停止屠杀!
sentences.en: Please stay the bloodshed!

sentences.cn: 在节日的期间他们停止了吸毒,还有接下去的一周.
sentences.en: They stayed drug free throughout the festival and into the next week.

sentences.cn: 他已停止呕吐,因此他吃下去的东西现在可以留在胃里了.
sentences.en: He has stopped vomiting and his food should stay down now.

sentences.cn: 任何停止学习的人都已经老了，无论是20岁还是80岁。坚持学习的人永远年轻，人生最美好的事就是保持年轻的心。
sentences.en: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
sentences.from: 金山词霸 每日一句

sentences.cn: 在晃动停止并确认户外安全后,方可离间.
sentences.en: Stay inside until the shaking stops and it is safe to go outside.

sentences.cn: 烟草公司已经要求在执行前暂时停止该法.
sentences.en: The tobacco companies have demanded a stay of execution before.

sentences.cn: 他找到菲利普,命令他停止和他妹妹交往.
sentences.en: He sought out Philip and ordered him to stay away from him sister.

sentences.cn: 当飞机左翼发动机停止转动时,他就想让飞机着陆.
sentences.en: He wanted to land his plane when the left engine of the plane stayed turning.

sentences.cn: 极少受训者坚持到底了。
sentences.en: Very few of the trainees have stayed the course.

sentences.cn: 他坚持不睡,来照看病人.
sentences.en: He insisted on staying up to nurse the patient.

sentences.cn: 但卡梅伦所有坚持到底的誓言中隐晦的信息却是卑微的.
sentences.en: Yet for all Mr Cameron's vows to stay the course , his underlying message was humble.

sentences.cn: 更是在这个时期,人类坚持了下来.
sentences.en: Yet this time the people stayed.

sentences.cn: 虽然电影的镜头令人讨厌, 他们还是坚持到看完.
sentences.en: In spite of the unpleasant scenes in the movie, they stayed until the bitter end.

sentences.cn: 他心情?I促,但决心坚持下去.
sentences.en: He was restless but determined to stay the course.

sentences.cn: 我坚持他留在原来的地方.
sentences.en: I insist that he should stay where he is.

sentences.cn: 金姆看见了她母亲,坚持要留下来帮助泰瑞.
sentences.en: Kim sees Teri and insists on staying to help her mother.

sentences.cn: 在一个频率上坚持地呼叫(换句话说就是不要轻易扫地? )
sentences.en: Stay on one frequency and keep on calling.

sentences.cn: going.他们坚持留下来,而不愿意走.
sentences.en: They insisted on staying rather than.

sentences.cn: 他在废墟下坚持了三个月才被救援队找到.
sentences.en: He stayed three months beneath the ruins before the rescue team found him.

sentences.cn: ngoing. 他们坚持留下来,而不愿意走.
sentences.en: They insisted on staying rather tha.

sentences.cn: 他们坚持要她待在后方.
sentences.en: They insisted upon her staying in the rear.

sentences.cn: 我们必须同我们自身的懒惰作斗争,坚持锻炼.
sentences.en: We must struggle against our own laziness and stay with our training.

sentences.cn: 他再也坚持不下去了.
sentences.en: He couldn't stay any longer.

sentences.cn: 有好主意要坚持.
sentences.en: Get a good idea and stay with it.

sentences.cn: 虽然电影有一些令人不快的镜头, 但她坚持要看完.
sentences.en: Despite the unpleasant scenes in the movie, she insisted on staying until the bitter end.

sentences.cn: 我咬紧牙关坚持到底.
sentences.en: I gritted my teeth and stayed there to the end.

sentences.cn: Mike的叔叔坚持不住这家旅馆.
sentences.en: Mike's uncle insists that he not stay in this hotel.

sentences.cn: 他制定了自己的议程和人生目标﹐并且坚持到底.
sentences.en: He set his agenda and purpose in life and stayed with it.

sentences.cn: 我妻子帮助我坚持坦荡正直地做人.
sentences.en: My wife helps me stay on the straight and narrow.

sentences.cn: 早早的去训练, 在比赛中坚持在板凳上支持我的队友,直到最后.
sentences.en: Showing up to practice early, staying late and supporting my teammates during games from the bench.

sentences.cn: 再坚持另一晚上, 然后再一天.
sentences.en: They stayed up the next night too, and the day after.

sentences.cn: 他们坚持留下来,而不愿意走.
sentences.en: They insisted on staying rather than going.

sentences.cn: 那位新工人不太强壮,因而我怀疑他是否能坚持到底.
sentences.en: That new labourer is not very strong and I doubt if he'll stay the course.

sentences.cn: 他坚持要我留下来吃中午饭.
sentences.en: He insisted on my staying for lunch.

sentences.cn: 系统一旦建立就应该坚持, 最大限度的利用它.
sentences.en: Once firmly established, the system will fight to stay alive , so make the most of it.

sentences.cn: 他坚持跑完了比赛全程.
sentences.en: He stayed the whole distance of the race.

sentences.cn: 可是我们坚持下去,因为我们了解我们有一个共同的目标.
sentences.en: But we stayed with it because we understood that we had a common cause.

sentences.cn: 政府未采取措施抑制物价上涨.
sentences.en: The government took no step to stay the rise in prices.

sentences.cn: 甚至他的矫揉造作也是抑制在他的品格范围以内.
sentences.en: Even his faking had to stay within character.

sentences.cn: 糟糕的体制会抑制个人才能的发挥.
sentences.en: A bad system will stay the performance of excellent individual.

sentences.cn: 我在布拉格逗留期间过得很开心。
sentences.en: I enjoyed my stay in Prague.

sentences.cn: 他晚上经常在外面逗留到很晚.
sentences.en: He stays out late at nights.

sentences.cn: 你在这儿逗留期间,请和我保持电话联系.
sentences.en: Please keep in touch by phone during your stay here.

sentences.cn: 我们想尽量令你的逗留愉快.
sentences.en: We want to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

sentences.cn: 有一天, 他们逗留直到摊子收摊,结果发现骇人的事实.
sentences.en: One day, they stayed till closing time and discovered some shocking facts!

sentences.cn: 我特地为你们安排使你们在北京的逗留愉快.
sentences.en: I have come to make sure that your stay in Beijing is a pleasant one.

sentences.cn: 我想跳过 秋季 学期的课, 多在农场逗留几个月.
sentences.en: Ithought of skipping the fall se & shy; mester and staying around a few more months.

sentences.cn: 在提出申请时,申请人必须身在香港并且是合法逗留.
sentences.en: The applicant must be staying in Hong Kong legally application is made.

sentences.cn: 我特地为你们安排使你们在深圳的逗留愉快.
sentences.en: I've come to make sure that your stay in shenzhen is a pleasant one.

sentences.cn: 但愿您逗留期间一切还愉快.
sentences.en: I hope you have enjoyed your stay.

sentences.cn: 我特地为你们安排使你们在广东的逗留愉快.
sentences.en: I've come to make sure that your stay in Canton is a pleasant one.

sentences.cn: “绿林少年”准备在此逗留5天.
sentences.en: The Greenwood Boys will be staying for five days.

sentences.cn: 你在英国逗留期间的地址是 哪里 ?
sentences.en: What is your address during your stay in Britain?

sentences.cn: 我正在找一个可以逗留的地方.
sentences.en: I'm looking for a place to stay.

sentences.cn: 她在 拉各斯 逗留了一个多月.
sentences.en: She stayed in Lagos ( for ) over a month.

sentences.cn: 他通晓这种语言,所以逗留期间过得很惬意.
sentences.en: His familiarity with the language helped him enjoy his stay.

sentences.cn: 他逗留了一会儿,接受了两位和尚的忠告.
sentences.en: He stayed for awhile and received advice from both of them.

sentences.cn: 星期二: 上咗大陆工作、还逗留了一晩! 因为跑咗両个地方、体力亦透支很多.
sentences.en: Tuesday : I went to China for work and stayed over the night ~!

sentences.cn: 这是我所有与金桢勋逗留期间的经验.
sentences.en: That is all of my experiences with Kim Jeong Hoon during his stay.

sentences.cn: 2007年6月1日星期五,他的逗留在曼谷的最后一天.
sentences.en: On Friday 1 June 2007, the last day of his stay in Bangkok.

sentences.cn: 感谢你在此逗留期间为我做的一切.
sentences.en: Thank you for everything you have done for me during my stay here.
sentences.from: 英汉 - 翻译样例 - 口语

sentences.cn: 远离事故区域. 在事故现场逗留会妨碍救助行动, 也可能会对自己造成危险.
sentences.en: Stay away from damaged areas. Your presence could hamper relief efforts, and you could endanger yourself.

sentences.cn: 她在巴黎逗留了3天.
sentences.en: She stayed in Paris for three days.

sentences.cn: 个性迥异的两兄弟在日本的一间禅宗修道院相聚并且短暂逗留.
sentences.en: Two very different brothers get together for a temporary stay in a Japanese zen monastry.

sentences.cn: 在巴黎逗留期间,我们遇到了一个来自瑞士的旅游团.
sentences.en: While staying in Paris we fell in with a party of Swiss tourists.

sentences.cn: 你在伦敦逗留期间过得愉快 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do you enjoy your staying in London?

sentences.cn: 父亲不许我们在外面逗留太晚.
sentences.en: Father put a veto upon our staying out late.

sentences.cn: 他在那儿逗留期间,欠了一大笔帐.
sentences.en: He ran up a big bill during his stay there.

sentences.cn: 她在那城市逗留期间,接触了许多要人.
sentences.en: She came into contact with many important people during her stay in that city.

sentences.cn: 在逗留期间他将游览一下这里.
sentences.en: He will do some sighing during his stay here.

sentences.cn: 我该到哪里去办理逗留延期?
sentences.en: Where can I get a stay extension?

sentences.cn: 阿卡拉通过延长一项命令来延期此项禁令到失效, 此即意味着这项命令届时也将失效.
sentences.en: Arcara extended an order staying the injunction until then, which means it will have no effect.

sentences.cn: 他们延期了她的签证时间,她又在广州停留了一周.
sentences.en: They extended her visa and she stayed one more week in Guangzhou.

sentences.cn: 那个死囚在最后一刻获准延期行刑.
sentences.en: That man on death row was granted a stay of execution at the eleventh hour.
